author: Allyson Chiu, Katie Shepherd
title: Trump asked if disinfectants could be injected to kill coronavirus inside the body. Doctors answered: ‘People will die.’ - The Washington Post
description:
1. Trump asked if disinfectants could be injected to kill coronavirus inside the body. Doctors answered: ‘People will die.’  The Washington Post
  2. Trump, officials suggest coronavirus is weakened by sunlight and humidity  Fox News
  3. Trump…
content:
The question, which Trump offered unprompted, immediately spurred doctors to respond with incredulity and warnings against injecting or otherwise ingesting disinfectants, which are highly toxic.
My concern is that people will die. People will think this is a… [+4535 chars]
